Package io.micronaut.serde

Interface Serde<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type
All Superinterfaces:
Deserializer<T>, Serializer<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
NullableSerde<T>, NumberSerde<N>, TemporalSerde<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBsonSerde, AbstractOracleJsonSerde, BsonRepresentationSerde, CodecBsonDecoder, DefaultFormattedTemporalSerde, HealthStatusSerde, InstantSerde, LocalDateSerde, LocalDateTimeSerde, LocalTimeSerde, ObjectArraySerde, OffsetDateTimeSerde, OracleJsonBinarySerde, OracleJsonDurationSerde, OracleJsonLocaleDateSerde, OracleJsonLocaleDateTimeSerde, OracleJsonLocaleTimeSerde, OracleJsonOffsetDateTimeSerde, OracleJsonZonedDateTimeSerde, YearSerde, ZonedDateTimeSerde
@Indexed(Serde.class) public interface Serde<T> extends Serializer<T>, Deserializer<T>
Combined interface for a serializer and deserializer pair.
